attributes.action: Give a knighthood to Bob Paisley
attributes.additional_details: Bob Paisley won 20 trophies in 11 years he was manager.He has been over looked with regards to receiving a knighthood.
attributes.background: Knight Bob Paisley former Liverpool football club manager

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
